jcolibri.cbrcase
Interface Individual

All Known Subinterfaces:
CBRCase, CBRQuery
All Known Implementing Classes:
CBRCaseJena, CBRCaseRecord, CBRGenericQuery, JenaIndividual, SimpleIndividual
public interface Individual

Represents the invidual concept. CBRCase are individuals, their attributes are also individuals.
